boardgame.name: Mutant Meeples
boardgame.description: Just outside Meeptropolis, several meeples on a camping trip are attacked by a swarm of giant radioactive butterflies. As a result, they all gain super speed and one other unique superpower, turning them into...Mutant Meeples!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The city of Meeptropolis has long been in decay, with crimes happening one after the other all over the city. The city council has asked YOU to put together the best possible team of Mutant Meeples to serve as protectors for their fine city._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Mutant Meeples is a puzzle game based on Alex Randolph's game Ricochet Robots in which players are looking to find the shortest _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;path_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; to get their meeples to the scene of the crime before any of the other players, using a clever combination of Mutant Meeples and their unique superpowers and super speed. If you're the fastest to the scene of the crime, you add a meeple to your super team; the first player to fill his super team with Mutant Meeples wins!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;But there's a catch _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; once one of your meeples has reached the scene of the crime, he no longer participates. (After all, he_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rsquo;s already _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;made the team_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;.) This gives players who have fewer meeples on their super teams more options, and provides an additional challenge to players whose super team is almost full._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Mutant Meeples contains a huge 22_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; double-sided board, eight custom super-powered Mutant Meeples, and much much more._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Also included is the expansion:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Mutant Meeples: Sidekicks allows for more variety in Mutant Meeples thanks to two new super-powered meeples _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; Nacho Fast and SwapMeet _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; that can be used in place of those in the original game, as well as tiles that modify both sides of the game board, making them easier or more difficult to match your cranial capacity._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: ET88: Merchant _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Seacab_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;oacute;, esto es t_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;oacute;
The Spiel at Essen 2011 - Bezier Games

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Mutant Meeples incl. Sidekick Expansion. English/German first edition Publisher: Bézier Games,?Pegasus Spiele
German Edition by Pegasus - NEW! Includes the Sideskicks-Expansion. Bezahlung per Paypal oder per Banküberweisung.

Bézier Games (BEZMUTM) Just outside Meeptropolis, several meeples on a camping trip are attacked by a swarm of giant radioactive butterflies. As a result, they all gain super speed and one other unique superpower, turning them into...Mutant Meeples! The city of Meeptropolis has long been in decay, with crimes happening one after the other all over the city. The city council has asked YOU to put together the best possible team of Mutant Meeples to serve as protectors for their fine city. Mutant Meeples is a puzzle game in the vein of Ricochet Robots in which players are looking to find the shortest _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;path_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; to get their meeples to the scene of the crime before any of the other players, using a clever combination of Mutant Meeples and their unique superpowers and super speed. If you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re the fastest to the scene of the crime, you add a meeple to your super team; the first player to fill his super team with Mutant Meeples wins! But there_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s a catch - once one of your meeples has reached the scene of the crime, he no longer participates. (After all, he_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s already _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;made the team_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;.) This gives players who have fewer meeples on their super teams more options, and provides an additional challenge to players whose super team is almost full.
Reserved for auction winner larryjrice.

Bézier Games (BEZMUTM) Just outside Meeptropolis, several meeples on a camping trip are attacked by a swarm of giant radioactive butterflies. As a result, they all gain super speed and one other unique superpower, turning them into...Mutant Meeples! If you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re the fastest to the scene of the crime, you add a meeple to your super team; the first player to fill his super team with Mutant Meeples wins! But there_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s a catch - once one of your meeples has reached the scene of the crime, he no longer participates. (After all, he_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s already _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;made the team_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;.) This gives players who have fewer meeples on their super teams more options, and provides an additional challenge to players whose super team is almost full.

In excellent condition, I only played it once. Better than new, because I applied those stickers, and that wasn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t exactly easy. I was very careful, and all stickers are on in an careful way, centered on the meeples, etc. Includes the Kickstarter Sidekick expansion. Buyer Prepays plus USPS Priority Shipping. Probably about $12 but we_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll weigh it and confirm what box it fits in before quoting final shipping charge.

Brand new, never opened, never played. Gotta clear some games out to make room for new ones, so my loss is your gain. Shipping is $6.00. If you purchase more than one game I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll try to consolidate packages to save shipping . Paypal only please. And sorry, I don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t sell to buyers outside of the US.
Reserved for Paul Buchholz
opened, played once. kickstarter edition
Played a couple of times. Like new condition.
Reserved for william4192 from auction. Includes Sidekicks expansion.
UK Shipping only £5.99 P_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;P

Game: Mutant Meeples (Pegasus) Condition: new in shrinkwrap Language: German/English comes with the sidekick expansion Payment: Bank transfer to an EU bank account using IBAN/BIC in advance (normally free of charge if your bank account is nominated in EURO) Paypal (add 3,- Euro to cover the fees. I can offer discounts on shipping if multiple marketplace purchases are made. Returns and Cancellation: You may cancel your order without giving any reasons within 14 days after placing your order. Please contact spieleberatung@t-online.de and I will attempt to resolve the matter. Unopened copies of the game that are no longer wanted can be returned, but there is a 10% restocking fee payable of the item price and the buyer is responsible for the return shipping costs.
